channel.title: Brisbane s calendar Light up Brisbane
channel.description: This calendar includes scheduled lights ups of Council assets including Story Bridge, Reddacliff Place sculptures, Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City Hall, King George Square, William Jolly Bridge and Tropical Dome at Brisbane Botanic Gardens Mt Coot-tha.

item.title: Christmas in Brisbane
item.description:
Sunday, December 11, 2022

The Story Bridge will be lit Red and Green to support Christmas in Brisbane.

Brisbane comes alive this December with plenty of Christmas festivities ideal for the whole family. Join us for the Lighting of the Christmas Tree, sing along to your favourite Christmas tunes at the Lord Mayor's Christmas Carols or drop by South Bank Parklands for music, Christmas movies under the stars, markets and many more activities. Find out what Brisbane has on offer this festive season.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Venue: Story Bridge, Kangaroo Point
Venue address: Story Bridge, Main Street, Kangaroo Point

item.title: Christmas in Brisbane
item.description:
Sunday, December 11, 2022

City Hall will be lit Red and Green to celebrate Christmas in Brisbane.

The City will host an exciting Christmas program in 2022, bringing the spirit of Christmas to the locals and visitors during December. Be amazed by the magic of Christmas at The Lott by Golden Casket City Hall Lights as Brisbane's iconic City Hall is immersed in a vibrant visual lighting and audio display that can't be missed. The free show occurs every 15 minutes from 7.30pm to midnight daily from the 9 to 24 of December.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Venue: Brisbane City Hall, Brisbane City
Venue address: Brisbane City Hall, 64 Adelaide Street, Brisbane City

Brisbane comes alive this December with plenty of Christmas festivities ideal for the whole family. Join us for the Lighting of the Christmas Tree, sing along to your favourite Christmas tunes at the Lord Mayor's Christmas Carols or drop by South Bank Parklands for music, Christmas movies under the stars, markets and many more activities. Find out what Brisbane has on offer this festive season.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Venue: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
